'''"I Got Reincarnated as an Onikabuto... And Flipped the World Upside Down"''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during by talking to [[Langqing]] after completing {{Quest|...It's the Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness!}}.

==Text==
Raven, took an arrow to the heart<br><!--
-->And the bake-danuki, shapeshifted into dark<br><!--
-->I, Weasel Thief, hereby bequeath all my Mora:<br><!--
-->Two hundred goes to my pa<br><!--
-->Three hundred to dear mama<br><br><!--
-->Poor little General Crab,<br><!--
-->Only a shell remains<br><!--
-->Unagi goodbye<br><!--
-->Now rest in peace, please don't cry<br><!--
-->'Cause we'll get reborn as a beetle next time<br><!--
-->Onikabuto, raise your horns<br><!--
-->Here's to a world beyond the storm<br><!--
-->Of rosy skies
